content.rendered:
As Principal Surveyor, Gary is responsible for attending all H&M, P&I claims and vessel condition surveys in Australia including PNG and some pacific islands. He also provides Pre-Port State Control inspections and training for ship operators. He is a Marine engineer holding a Class 1 Marine Engineer Certificate of Competency and has 25 years seagoing experience on general cargo, bulk and passenger ships.

Contact

Cairns | +61 (0) 408 707 370

Discipline: Engineer
Specialism: Ship Condition Surveys, Accident investigations
Expert Witness Expertise: Desktop reviews for legal cases and witness in accident cases
